customHeadContent:
<style>
  div[data-element-type='content'] a {
      color: blue;
  }    
</style>  
<script>
  function GetURLParameter(sParam){
    arr=window.location.hash.split(sParam+"=");
    if (arr.length>0){
      return arr[1];
    }
    return null;
  }  
  function isPrimaryBiller(){
    var parentMember=K('field[Billing Parent Member]').value();
    var familyMembers=K('field[Billing Family Members]').value();
    debugger;
   	if (K('field[Members]').value()===parentMember && familyMembers!==null && familyMembers!==undefined){
      var dependants=JSON.parse(familyMembers);
      if (dependants.length>1) {
	      return true;
      }
    }
    return false;
  }
  
</script>
description: Request to resume a Frozen Member
name: Stripe Resume Frozen Member

events.name: Get Member
Clear Member Details

elements.name: Primary Family Member
elements.visible: !form('review') && values('Members')!==null && isPrimaryBiller() && (values('Billing Customer Reference')!=="" || values('Billing Customer Reference')!==null)  && (typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails)

elements.name: Primary Family Member Info
elements.text:
Primary Family Member

The member selected $studentName$ is the Primary family member.
Completing this form will also Resume all Family members.
If you only wish to Resume this member and NOT the dependant members, please follow below.
  • Click here to complete Stripe Setup Biller Details(Family) form to remove dependant members from billing.
  • Set the students status to Resume, after completing the above form.

elements.name: Family Dependant Member
elements.visible: !form('review') && values('Members')!==null && values('Non Paying')!=="YES" && (values('Billing Parent Member')!=="" && values('Billing Parent Member')!==null && values('Billing Parent Member')!==values('Members'))  && (values('Billing Customer Reference')==="" || values('Billing Customer Reference')===null)  && (typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails)

elements.name: Family Dependant Info
elements.text:
Family Dependant Member

The member selected $studentName$ is a depend family member.
  • Complete the Stripe Setup Biller Details(Family) form to add the student to billing.
    • Click here to complete form.
  • Set the students status to Active, after completing the above form.

elements.name: Non Paying Member
elements.visible: !form('review') && values('Members')!==null &&  (values('Non Paying')==="YES" || values('Billing Customer Reference')==="" || values('Billing Customer Reference')===null) && values('Billing Parent Member')===values('Members')&& (typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails)

elements.name: Non Paying Info
elements.text:
Non Paying Member or has No Billing

The member selected $studentName$ is a Non Paying member or has No Billing.
  • Set the students status to Active directly on the Members record.
  • Click here to change status

elements.name: Resume Information
elements.visible: values('Members')!==null  && (values('Billing Customer Reference')!=="" && values('Billing Customer Reference')!==null)  && ((typeof(loadingDetails) !== "undefined" && !loadingDetails) || form('review'))

elements.name: Date payment will resume HTML
Date payment will resume
elements.label: Date payment will resume (Payment will be billed)(Next billing cycle date)

elements.name: Info
elements.text:
When the value for field "Date payment will resume" is "Invalid date", you cannot use this form to resume a Frozen student.

Either the student has not been properly activate with Bambora, or a student is a child of another student who is the biller.

elements.name: Terms Information
elements.text:
You hereby agree not to cancel of debit authority via your bank account or credit card for any reason and any debts owing to $school_legal_name$. LTD.

You may cancel this contract if you (1) relocate your residence further than 20km from any school operated by Gracie Barra; (2) medical condition, being a permanent disability that will not allow the practice of BJJ for a considerable time (at least one year); (3) deployment in the case the student is military; (4) unexpected unemployment.

For any cancellation request, the appropriate document must be provided:

* Change of Address: bill or lease agreement for the new address;
* Medical Condition: doctor's letter proving the permanent disability;
* Document proving deployment;
* Document proving the person lost the job;

Students who would like to cancel without reason must give 60 day's written notice.

Cancellation requests must be in person or via email sent to $school_email$ with any appropriate documentation. Requests will be reviewed and responded to within three business days.

Students enrolled in the Future Champions Programs can cancel their agreement for any reason upon delivery of 60 days written cancellation notice to the school.

* Gracie Barra reserves the right to alter the days, hours of operation and classes if deemed necessary to better fit the student's needs.

* The student and co-signer agree unconditionally to pay the above tuition without regard to the attendance made or classes missed.

* Gracie Barra reserves the right to use any images, video footage and conduct interviews from Gracie Barra students. By signing this form you hereby grant Gracie Barra permission to use and or publish through any marketing channels.

* The student consents to Gracie Barra collecting and using their personal information provided it is only used for the purposes of the proper running of the Gracie Barra business and will not be disclosed to third parties unless required by law.

Note: This agreement is non-refundable.

elements.label: Submit
elements.name: Submit Button
elements.enabled: values('Members')!==null && (values('Billing Customer Reference')!=="" && values('Billing Customer Reference')!==null)

Load Members Select
Load Review
Set Defaults
